Title: Amirdrassil, the Dream's Hope: Fyrakk
Description:
Fyrakk may have entered the temple, but our fight has not ended. Thanks to your efforts, we have broken through his forces. There is still time to stop him.

You must gather your allies and follow Fyrakk into the Wellspring Temple. We will cover your flank.

Know that it is not only Amirdrassil that you protect this day, $n. All of Azeroth will burn if Fyrakk claims the World Tree. He must be stopped, here and now. This is our final stand.
ObjectivesText: Enter Amirdrassil, the Dream's Hope, and defeat Fyrakk.
